content.raw:
Could we include a little test more before merging?

```
#!diff
diff -r b761b1cf7176 test/integration/world.cc
--- a/test/integration/world.cc	Tue Oct 22 14:56:02 2013 -0700
+++ b/test/integration/world.cc	Fri Oct 25 22:54:55 2013 +0200
@@ -34,6 +34,11 @@
 
   EXPECT_EQ(world->GetModelCount(), 0u);
 
+  // Simulate a clear with no objects
+  world->Clear()
+  
+  EXPECT_EQ(world->GetModelCount(), 0u);
+
   SpawnSphere("sphere", math::Vector3(0, 0, 1), math::Vector3(0, 0, 0));

```
